  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(boolean u, LocalDate d, boolean maxRetries, boolean paid, Company c)
      Constructor that creates a new Order
      Parameters:
      u - boolean that checks if the order is urgent
      d - date for the order
      maxRetries - boolean that represents if the max number of retries has been reached
      paid - boolean that checks if the order has been paid
      c - company that wants to create the new order
